SkewCalculator.GC

public SkewCalculator.GC(GenomeData genomeData,
                         int stepSize,
                         int windowSize)
Creates a new GC skew calculator around the passed genomic data, with the passed properties.

Parameters:
genomeData - The data to calculate averages for.
stepSize - The step size for the skew calculations.
windowSize - The window size for the skew calculations.
